title: KIM SWITCH / PAWNSHOP
description: Kim suggests you can get money by selling things here.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm pretty sure you can pick up so..."
links.text: "I'm pretty sure you can pick up some odds and ends to sell here." He nods toward a table of knick-knacks. "The owner seems to have *eclectic* taste."

links.title: Authority: "Eclectic taste? This shop is full o..."
links.text: Eclectic taste? This shop is full of *stolen* goods -- a blight on the community!

links.title: You: ""Mhm. I plan to *enterprise* my way..."
links.text: "Mhm. I plan to *enterprise* my way out of this jam. I have a vision."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Sure. Why not?" It doesn't sound l..."
links.text: "Sure. Why not?" It doesn't sound like he believes in the *vision*.

links.title: You: ""*Or* we could shut this place down..."
links.text: "*Or* we could shut this place down? The stuff is clearly stolen."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""On the contrary -- we should do ou..."
links.text: "On the contrary -- we should do our part to *support* the local economy."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "...we shouldn't disrupt the way thi..."
links.text: ...we shouldn't disrupt the way things are done here, he thinks. And have little power to do so anyway.

links.title: You: "(Lower your voice.) "You do realize..."
links.text: (Lower your voice.) "You do realize this place is full of stolen goods, right?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We can't go around punishing the p..."
links.text: "We can't go around punishing the people we're supposed to protect for breaking laws they don't even know exist."

links.title: You: ""Shouldn't we at least ask where so..."
links.text: "Shouldn't we at least ask where some of these things came from?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It won't help our investigation to..."
links.text: "It won't help our investigation to antagonize people we could interview."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It *would* help our investigation,..."
links.text: "It *would* help our investigation," he adds, his voice softening as he looks off to the side, "if you weren't so hard up for cash."

links.title: You: ""Oh... Yes, I see what you're getti..."
links.text: "Oh... Yes, I see what you're getting at. I guess we should just let it slide -- and maybe even profit?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It *would* help our investigation..."
links.text: "It *would* help our investigation if you weren't so hard up for cash."

links.title: Empathy: "It pains him to see a fellow office..."
links.text: It pains him to see a fellow officer struggling to make ends meet and not be able to offer assistance. This is his way of making it up to you.

links.title: You: ""True. There are inherent injustice..."
links.text: "True. There are inherent injustices in the social system I -- and all of us -- find ourselves in."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He nods. "Go ahead, do your part to..."
links.text: He nods. "Go ahead, do your part to support this grass-roots initiative."

links.title: You: ""You misunderstood me. I think it's..."
links.text: "You misunderstood me. I think it's super cool and *gangster* that he sells stolen goods."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I wouldn't go that far but..." He..."
links.text: "I wouldn't go that far but..." He shrugs. "Why not?"

dialogueTree.title: You: ""Won't make my fortune here, but it..."
dialogueTree.text: "Won't make my fortune here, but it does seem like a good place to start."

dialogueTree.title: You: ""My financial situation is great! S..."
dialogueTree.text: "My financial situation is great! Superstars don't have problems with finances!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Sure. But one's financial situatio..."
links.text: "Sure. But one's financial situation could always be even better, right?"

links.title: Drama: "He doesn't really think you're a su..."
links.text: He doesn't really think you're a superstar or that you're well-off. He's only playing along because it's expedient.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm pretty sure you can pick up so..."
links.text: "I'm pretty sure you can pick up some odds and ends to sell here. Take a look around." He nods toward a table heaped with knick-knacks. "The owner has eclectic taste."

dialogueTree.title: You: ""My financial situation is none of..."
dialogueTree.text: "My financial situation is none of your business."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's not my intention to make it m..."
links.text: "It's not my intention to make it my business, just to move this investigation forward."

links.title: Composure: "He is mildly offended that his disp..."
links.text: He is mildly offended that his display of camaraderie went wrong -- though it doesn't show in his posture.

dialogueTree.title: You: ""I've accepted my lot -- sleeping o..."
dialogueTree.text: "I've accepted my lot -- sleeping on park benches, getting by on scraps..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He looks at you seriously. "An offi..."
links.text: He looks at you seriously. "An officer of the Citizens Militia can't live like that. We won't be able to complete *this investigation* if you live like that."

links.title: Composure: "The lieutenant's tone doesn't betra..."
links.text: The lieutenant's tone doesn't betray any frustration. Concern -- yes.

dialogueTree.title: You: ""I am fully deserving of the trials..."
dialogueTree.text: "I am fully deserving of the trials life has dealt me."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Perhaps, but it's no use punishing..."
links.text: "Perhaps, but it's no use punishing yourself more."

links.title: Empathy: "He's not too comfortable counsellin..."
links.text: He's not too comfortable counselling you like this, but he's genuinely concerned for your well-being.
